header.description: Three scalar values for the report header: date range bounds and report generation timestamp. date_from and date_to come from user parameters; generated_at is injected at runtime.

rows.description: One row per UTC minute from app_metrics_system_minute, filtered to the requested date range. Each row contains CPU %, memory %, disk read/write rates, network RX/TX rates, and process-level CPU, RSS, and handle count.

totals.description: No totals section defined in this template.

semantics: date_from and date_to are required user-supplied filter parameters that bound the minute_utc column. generated_at is a pass-through runtime scalar not derived from any database column.
transformations: No reshape required â€” all row tokens map directly to columns in app_metrics_system_minute with a NONE strategy.
Filter app_metrics_system_minute rows to those where minute_utc is between date_from and date_to inclusive.
Order result rows by minute_utc ascending to present chronological telemetry.
